airplane.description: A large flying machine with wings, engines, and a streamlined metallic body.

automobile.description: A four-wheeled vehicle designed for road transport with a compact metal body.

bird.description: A small feathered animal with wings, a beak, and a tail, often seen flying or perched.

cat.description: A small furry mammal with pointed ears, whiskers, and a long tail.

deer.description: A slender brown mammal with long legs and antlers, found in forests or grasslands.

dog.description: A medium-sized furry mammal with a rounded face, floppy ears, and a tail.

frog.description: A small green amphibian with smooth moist skin and long hind legs for jumping.

horse.description: A large animal with long legs, a mane, and a tail, often seen running in open fields.

ship.description: A large vessel floating on water with an elongated hull and deck structure.

truck.description: A large road vehicle with a front cab and extended cargo area for transport.
